name: LOK Disney Madness
description: Long ago the Korra fandom lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when Mermako attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all AUs can stop him, but when the world needed her most, she was Kuzkorra and decided to make babies with the Mermako now look what happened...

discussions.name: /* i really want this to be global */ ? No, you don't.
HOW DO YOU COMMENT ON THESE THINGS??
